statements: SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue;
SELECT client_id, revenue_amount FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT client_id, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM advertising_revenue GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue_amount > 1000 ORDER BY revenue_date DESC
SELECT client_id, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM advertising_revenue GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_revenue > 5000
SELECT client_id, COUNT(id) AS num_transactions FROM advertising_revenue GROUP BY client_id ORDER BY num_transactions DESC
SELECT client_id, AVG(revenue_amount) AS avg_revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY client_id
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue_date > '2022-08-01' ORDER BY revenue_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue;
SELECT id, revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, contact_email FROM client_contacts WHERE id=10;
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT client_name, contact_email FROM client_contacts ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue WHERE id = 1;
SELECT client_name, contact_email FROM client_contacts ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE client_id = 100 GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue WHERE campaign_id IN (105, 106) ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT client_name, COUNT(id) AS contact_count FROM client_contacts GROUP BY client_name HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, name, email FROM client_contacts ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions FROM campaign_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT id, date, amount FROM advertising_revenue WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue ORDER BY date ASC, amount DESC
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_clicks > 500;
SELECT id, name, email FROM client_contacts WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks/impressions AS click_through_rate FROM campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 0 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM advertising_revenue WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, revenue, campaign_id, client_id FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue > 1000
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM client_contacts WHERE client_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT id, clicks, impressions, conversion_rate FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM campaign WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign WHERE name = 'Summer Sale Campaign'
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue;
SELECT client_name, email FROM client_contacts WHERE phone_number = '123456789';
SELECT SUM(impressions), AVG(conversion_rate) FROM campaign_metrics WHERE clicks > 1000;
SELECT name, end_date FROM campaign ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM advertising_revenue JOIN client_contacts ON advertising_revenue.client_id = client_contacts.id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT name, email FROM client_contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT SUM(impressions), SUM(clicks) FROM campaign_performance_metrics GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(impressions) > 10000;
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE client_id = 2 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, name, email FROM client_contacts ORDER BY name DESC

SELECT clients.name, campaigns.name, campaign_performance_metrics.impressions FROM clients JOIN campaigns ON clients.id = campaigns.client_id JOIN campaign_performance_metrics ON campaigns.id = campaign_performance_metrics.id WHERE campaign_performance_metrics.conversions > 10 ORDER BY campaign_performance_metrics.impressions DESC

SELECT clients.name AS client_name, SUM(advertising_revenue.revenue) AS total_revenue FROM clients JOIN campaigns ON clients.id = campaigns.client_id JOIN advertising_revenue ON campaigns.id = advertising_revenue.campaign_id GROUP BY clients.name
SELECT client_contacts.name, client_contacts.email, clients.industry FROM client_contacts JOIN clients ON client_contacts.id = clients.contact_id WHERE clients.industry = 'Technology'
